description.text: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Устройте в этой области промышленную революцию! Два куба и база.

es.original: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
La cuna de la revolución industrial.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Startet in dieser Arena eine industrielle Revolution. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Dê início a uma revolução industrial nesta arena. Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: Start an industrial revolution in this arena. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: La révolution industrielle est en marche ! Deux cubes et une base.
